shrimp.name: Filterstep
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: val
output.description: value of step function at x

shrimp.usage: An antialiased step function. It's similar to step, but the result is filtered. If the optional max value is given, filters in range between min and max. The filter types are: box, triangle, catmull-rom, and gaussian. Pixie adds to these filters, the following: sinc, blackman-harris, mitchell.
